transcript.title: COMMONWEALTH FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR WEST AUSTRALIAN STATE SHIPPING SERVICE TO DARWIN - STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE RT HON WILLIAM MCMAHON CP MP
